__e: You're going with a girl Who probably still wears a retainer! Listen to me!
After all I've done you dare say that?
That's what you say to me two weeks after our own daughter moves away to California.
Still, you think it will be harder than against Akechi?
If you dare to say something else, You are fired
If you dare to say this is a good time to have sex, I'll murder you.
And you dare to come here hiding behind an identity you have not earned.
I don't even remember my mom, I haven't talked to my dad in years and you have the nerv to feel sorry for yourself.
Who are you, daring to cross my path?
I can't believe you fixed your mouth to say that, boy.
There's not a man in the world who'll take the tone with me you do.
I can't believe you. After what I did for your father, your family how you ever could say no to me.
How dare you try to kill my bride.
How dare you leave her in the same room!
How dare you fight alongside of us like a brother? How could you?
